Mountain Thunder Conqueror [Greater Style]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Warlord, Mountain Thunder Student feat
Benefit: When you are attacking with a one-handed hammer, a one-handed flail, or a one-handed mace and you have proficiency with that weapon, you gain the following two benefits.
Whenever you hit an enemy with a martial power, that enemy takes a â€“2 penalty to saving throws until the end of your next turn against effects that daze or stun.
When you hit an enemy with a power associated with this feat, you knock that enemy prone.


Associated Powers: Daring Display, Hold the Line, Sacrificial Lure, Thunderous Fury, Ventured Gains, Warlord's Doom

Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 122.
